title: PBE
body: Tengo un problema con el pbe......Es que me olvide la cuenta y la contraseña algo para hacer?

replies.body:
https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-username
https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-password

Got ya ;-)

El correo debería ser el mismo que el de la cuenta principal :3

Y si preguntas en el foro que es del PBE :VVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV
